pt.name: John Sundell
pt.subtitle: Criador do Swift by Sundell
pt.description: John cria apps, jogos e ferramentas para desenvolvedores. Ele também fez o Swift by Sundell - uma série de artigos semanais e um podcast sobre desenvolvimento com Swift, e é um dos hosts do podcast Stacktrace. Trabalhou para empresas como Volvo e Spotify, e agora trabalha criando aplicativos, ferramentas e conteúdos para a comunidade Swift.

en.name: John Sundell
en.subtitle: Creator of Swift by Sundell
en.description: John builds apps, games and developer tools. He also makes Swift by Sundell — a series of weekly articles and a podcast about Swift development, and co-hosts the Stacktrace podcast. He has worked for companies like Volvo and Spotify, and is now working full-time on creating apps, tools and content for the Swift community.
